author: Peter Van Buren
title: When COVID-19 Renders Your Job Obsolete
description: Yes, the very wealthy will survive, but many of us may end up more dependent on the state than we ever bargained for. The post When COVID-19 Renders Your Job Obsolete appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Yes, the very wealthy will survive, but many of us may end up more dependent on the state than we ever bargained for.The virus is a threat. Yet at the same time, we are making fundamental changes to society that will outlive the virus. It is not only possible… [+7732 chars]
